Elevate your link-sharing experience with the Tiny1z URL Shortener Extension for Chrome! Simplify long URLs into concise and shareable links directly from your browser. Enjoy the convenience of instant URL shortening without leaving your current tab. Unleash the power of Tiny1z to create tidy links effortlessly.

How to Use:

Install the Tiny1z URL Shortener Extension.
Click the extension on the chrome tab you want to shorten and a short url will be created swiftly.
Copy the short URL and share it wherever you want.

Happy shortening
